_source.text: A collection of grotesque satirical character sketches is called Der Ohrenzeuge (1974; translated as Earwitness , 1979); in the portrait devoted to the title character, the "Earwitness" himself, the reader learns that "his ear is better and more faithful than any gadget, nothing is erased, nothing is blocked,... he accurately registers even things he does not understand and delivers them unaltered if people wish him to do so."
